#summary Obtain all attachments

= How obtain all attachments =

== Object ==

{{{
<?php
$tt = new WP_Timthumb();
$params = array();
$tt->get_post_attachments($params);
foreach ($tt->post_attachments as $attachment) {
	//...//
}
?>
}}}

== Method ==
{{{
<?php
$params = array();
$attachments = get_post_attachments($params);
foreach ($attachments as $attachment) {
	// do something //
}
?>
}}}

== Defaults ==

{{{
<?php
$params = array(
		'object' => true,
		'post_id' => null,
		'limit' => -1
);
?> 
}}}
